docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome! Here, I showcase my journey of learning, building, and contributing to the ever-evolving world of          Artificial Intelligence.       AI Innovation | Open Source Contributor | Building with AI

docs.title: Featured Projects 🛠️
docs.text:
Explore the intersection of my curiosity and execution:

1️⃣ SLM Experiments: Experiments to optimize performance and alignment of Small Language Models.

2️⃣ Bash Mastery: Learning shell scripting through real-world tasks and practical workflows.

3️⃣ Applied Papers: Re-implementation of seminal AI papers to gain fresh insights.

🎯 View All Projects

docs.title: Education 🎓
docs.text: Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science Dr. D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth — Pune, India (2023 – 2027)

docs.title: Work Experience 💼
docs.text:
AI Research Intern — GreenPepper (Feb 2024 – Dec 2024)

Key Contributions:

  • Authored over five narrative reports that effectively explained business trends in Generative AI to stakeholders.
  • Conducted comprehensive analyses of research papers, business reports and scholarly articles, extracting valuable insights to lead decision-making.
  • Led the development of “The Generative AI Stack”, producing a detailed, 20+ page guide designed to drive innovation in business usecases.
  • Actively participated in the GenAI Sprint, focusing on researching AI applications in the medical domain.

docs.text:
• Taking Python to Production: A Professional Onboarding Guide

  • Git and GitHub

docs.title: Open Source Contributions
docs.text: I have contributed to the following repositories🛠️:

docs.title: NannyML/The-Little-Book-of-ML-Metrics
docs.text: A comprehensive guide for understanding and implementing machine learning metrics effectively.

docs.title: argilla-io/distilabel
docs.text: A streamlined tool for labeling, exploring, and fine-tuning data for machine learning workflows.

docs.title: huggingface/notebooks
docs.text: Community-driven notebooks offering hands-on tutorials for the Hugging Face ecosystem.

docs.title: huggingface/diffusers
docs.text: A library for diffusion models in PyTorch, supporting a wide range of image, video, and audio generation tasks.

docs.title: Lightning-AI/litgpt
docs.text: A modular framework for training and deploying large language models with PyTorch Lightning.

docs.title: cfahlgren1/observers
docs.text: A utility-focused repository aimed at improving workflows for observers in data pipelines.

docs.title: huggingface/notebooks
docs.text: Collaborative learning notebooks offering examples, tutorials, and guides for Hugging Face tools.

docs.title: skorch-dev/skorch
docs.text: A scikit-learn-compatible neural network library built on PyTorch for seamless integration with machine learning workflows.

docs.title: mlabonne/llm-datasets
docs.text: A repository for curating and managing high-quality datasets for training and fine-tuning large language models.

docs.title: huggingface/lighteval
docs.text: A lightweight evaluation library for assessing the performance of models and datasets.

docs.title: Projects
docs.text: I believe that projects are the best way to apply and deepen knowledge. Each project fuels my curiosity and enhances my skills.

docs.title: 1️⃣ Bash Mastery
docs.text: "Mastering the command line, one script at a time." Learning shell scripting effectively by solving real-world tasks. - 📂 Explore topics like automation, file management, and system monitoring. - 🌟 Hands-on tasks include building efficient workflows and scripting utilities.

docs.title: 2️⃣ SLM Experiments
docs.text: "Optimizing Small Language Models for performance and alignment." A collection of experiments aimed at improving the efficiency and adaptability of SLMs. - 🔍 Focus on performance tuning, parameter adjustments, and task-specific fine-tuning. - 🧪 Results contribute to scalable, lightweight language model research.

docs.title: 3️⃣ Applied Papers
docs.text: "Turning research into actionable insights." Re-implementing groundbreaking research papers to uncover new perspectives. - 🧠 Dive into topics like model architectures, optimization techniques, and experimental setups. - 📜 Gain deeper insights by analyzing reproducibility and extending existing findings.
